name: Flightera Flight Data
description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera

api_methods.name: airlineStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airline statistics for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

utterances.utterance: Can you check the on-time performance statistics for Lufthansa today?
I want to see detailed flight stats for American Airlines using their ICAO code.
Please find the current day's airline statistics for Delta Air Lines by their IATA code.
Could you provide me with the flight performance data for Emirates using their airline ident?
Show me the latest on-time statistics for British Airways based on their ICAO code.
I need the daily airline statistics for Air France, can you get that by their IATA code?
Retrieve the flight status and performance details for Japan Airlines using their ident code.
Look up the current airline statistics for Qatar Airways with their ICAO identifier.
Get me the on-time performance report for Southwest Airlines by their IATA code.
Find the detailed flight data for Singapore Airlines using their airline ident code.

api_methods.name: airportDelayDailyStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed daily delay statistics for an airport identified by the provided identifiers. If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided. Additionally, `dt` and `isDeparture` are required.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the data for the specific date.

parameters.name: isDeparture
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the desired statistics are for departures (true) or arrivals (false)

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The date for which delay statistics are desired, formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

utterances.utterance: Can you check the departure delay statistics for JFK airport on March 15, 2024?
I need the arrival delay data for Los Angeles International Airport on April 10, 2024.
Show me how many flights were delayed departing from Heathrow on February 20, 2024.
Find the daily delay statistics for arrivals at Tokyo Haneda Airport on January 5, 2024.
Get the departure delay report for Chicago O'Hare on May 1, 2024.
Could you provide the arrival delay statistics for Dubai International Airport on June 12, 2024?
I want to see the departure delays at Sydney Airport for July 4, 2024.
Retrieve the arrival delay data for Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport on August 18, 2024.
Please check the departure delay statistics for San Francisco International Airport on September 30, 2024.
Look up the arrival delay statistics for Frankfurt Airport on October 22, 2024.
